title: A Competency Test should be a MUST to play Ranked!!!
body:
Riot, please implement some form of Competency Test in order for people to be able to play Ranked Queues.  I can't even express my wishes for this because I am now a broken player.  After TWO seasons of the following:

Too many Maokai's playing Mid lane against a Jayce and getting destroyed.

Too many Alistar Jungler's that can't understand WHY they are behind and of little use to the team.

Etc, there has to be a better way for people to actually SHOW they have EARNED the right to play Ranked Queues.  And to all the people that will say "I'll just play my friend's account and get him past the test", Riot - you need to start religiously tracking those IP Addresses and start tossing the BAN HAMMER a little more liberally.

Please do something.  Inaction will not qualify as an action.  You owe it to your players!!!
